mean_cn: n.流浪者；  v.漂泊，流浪；  adj.流浪的，流浪者的，漂泊的
mean_en: a person who travels from place to place and does not have a home or much money
sentence: This homeless vagabond is sitting on the corner with only a small case and a piece of bread.
sentence_trans: 这位流浪汉携着一个小箱子和一小片面包坐在角落。
word_etyma: vag漫游 ＋ a ＋ bond倾向于…的 → 倾向于在街上漫游的人 → vagabond流浪的人
